successes.title: TAKEDOWN
successes.description: Join the game designer of GRAW and Halo Reach to help create the spiritual successor to the original Rainbow Six and SWAT4.

Pledges.description: The finished full game, via digital Distribution when it's released.  Also access to the private discussion forums and access to developer blogs.
The finished full game, via digital Distribution when it's released. Access to the private discussion forums and access to developer blogs.
A unit patch for the game's military unit, suitable for wear on your tactical vest.  You know you have a tactical vest, for when the zombies come.
Access to the Silver Community Level, where you will be able to vote on weapons, locations, and features to be included in the game.  Includes all previous rewards.
Your name in a special "Kickstarter Supporters" section of the credits.  Includes all previous rewards.
A PC CD copy of the game, DRM free, along with a T-Shirt with the game logo on it.  All previous rewards included.
Access to the Gold Community Level, where you will be able to submit game content to be included in the final game if approved, along with credit for the content.
A collectors edition boxed set of the PC CD version of the game, including a set of dog tags with the unit logo on them, and an art book from the game.  Includes all previous rewards.
A military unit challenge coin with the insignia of the team on it.  Includes all previous rewards.
A DVD of the soundtrack of the game including all music tracks, signed by the composer.  Includes all previous rewards.
Original poster of the cover of the game (shipping is free in the U.S., $10 shipping internationally). Special thanks in the credits. Includes all previous rewards.
Get an in-game badge on your player model showing that you supported the project!  Includes all previous rewards.
Access to the Platinum Level community, where you will be able to participate in conference calls with dev team members to express your ideas.   Includes all previous rewards.
Get your face in the game, on one of the team members, and have them named after you.  Includes all previous rewards.

Tour the dev studio and go on a shooting trip with dev team members for an afternoon, shooting a range of different guns, including full-auto fun (must be able to travel to Seattle, WA)!  Includes all previous rewards.
